name: Kung Fu Bullet
description:
Shmup(shoot em up), BUT you don't shoot. 

Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK Game jam

You are a single bullet flying through your enemies. 

Control the bullet with your mouse, but don't let your mouse stop on the bullet or else you explode. "The Bullet Must Keep Moving!"

You can kill enemies by charging through them, BUT run into ANYTHING else (including the edges of the screen) and you Explode. 

There are three enemy types and two obstacles. For now it's just an infinite wave shooter (err.. not-shooter) that saves your high score. I might add levels and bosses in the future.

*Bullet Art provided by Tony from Sketchflix
  along with help in Game Jam Brainstorming
